data.text: Mfa ɔkyena nhoahoa wo ho,
Ma ɔfoforo nkamfo wo; na ɛnyɛ wo ankasa;
Ɔbo mu yɛ duru, na nwea yɛ adesoa,
Abufuw tirim yɛ den, na abufuwhyew sɛe ade,
Animka a ɛda gua
Apirakuru a efi adamfo nkyɛn no ye
Ɛwo nyɛ nea wamee akɔnnɔ,
Onipa a wayera ne fi kwan,
Ngo ne aduhuam ma koma ani gye,
Nnyaa wʼadamfo ne wʼagya adamfo mu,
Me ba, hu nyansa na ma me koma ani nnye;
Mmadwemma hu asiane na wohintaw,
Fa atade a ɛhyɛ obi a odi ɔhɔho akagyinamu;
Sɛ obi teɛ mu hyira ne yɔnko anɔpahema a,
Ɔyere tɔkwapɛfo te sɛ
sɛ wopata no a, ɛte sɛ nea wopata mframa
Dade sew dade,
Nea ɔhwɛ borɔdɔma dua so no bedi so aba,
Sɛnea nsu yi animdua kyerɛ no,
Sɛnea Owu ne Ɔsɛe bo ntɔ da no,
Kyɛmfɛre wɔ hɔ ma dwetɛ na fononoo wɔ hɔ ma sikakɔkɔɔ,
Sɛ wowɔw ɔkwasea wɔ ɔwaduru mu,
Ma ɛnyɛ wo asɛnhia sɛ wubehu wo nguankuw tebea,
efisɛ, ahonya ntena hɔ daa,
Sɛ wotwa sare no na foforo fifi,
ɛno de, nguantenmma no bɛma wo ntama,
Wubenya mmirekyi nufusu bebree
